page.trainersOnly: Only trainers can generate training programs.
page.createInMinutes: Create a personalized program in minutes
page.answerQuestionnaire: Answer the questionnaire and our AI will create a complete training program tailored to your client's goals, availability, and equipment.
page.selectClientFirst: Select a client at the top before starting the questionnaire.

profile.title: Personal Profile
profile.subtitle: Tell us about yourself to personalize your training program.
profile.experienceHelp: Include all your regular weight training time

fitnessLevels.beginnerDesc: Less than 1 year of regular training
fitnessLevels.advancedDesc: More than 3 years of regular training

goals.title: Training Goals
goals.subtitle: Define what you want to achieve with your training program.
goals.muscleGroupsHelp: Select the groups you want to prioritize in your training
goals.specificGoalsPlaceholder: E.g.: Increase my bench press to 100kg, improve arm definition, correct muscle imbalances...
goals.specificGoalsHelp: Separate each goal with a comma

options.fat_lossDesc: Reduce body fat while maintaining muscle

availability.title: Availability
availability.subtitle: Tell us how much time you can dedicate to training.
availability.preferredDaysHelp: Select the days you prefer to train
availability.summaryText: You will train {{days}} days per week, with sessions of approximately {{duration}} minutes each.
availability.highFrequencyWarning: Note: With 5+ training days, it's important to ensure adequate recovery.

equipment.title: Available Equipment
equipment.subtitle: Indicate what equipment you have available for training.
equipment.gymAccess: Do you have access to a gym? *
equipment.availableEquipmentHelp: Select all equipment you can use
equipment.notesPlaceholder: E.g.: I only have dumbbells up to 20kg, my bench is not adjustable...

restrictions.title: Restrictions and Limitations
restrictions.subtitle: Tell us if you have any physical limitations we should consider. This information is optional but helps us create a safer program.
restrictions.importantText: If you have serious injuries or medical conditions, we recommend consulting with a healthcare professional before starting any training program.
restrictions.injuriesPlaceholder: E.g.: Left knee pain, L5 disc herniation, right shoulder tendinitis...
restrictions.injuriesHelp: Separate each injury with a comma
restrictions.excludedExercisesPlaceholder: E.g.: Back squat, conventional deadlift, military press...
restrictions.excludedExercisesHelp: Exercises that cause discomfort or you simply don't want to do
restrictions.medicalPlaceholder: E.g.: Hypertension, type 2 diabetes, heart problems...
restrictions.mobilityPlaceholder: E.g.: Cannot raise arms above head, limited hip mobility...
restrictions.summaryText: We have noted your restrictions. The program will adapt to avoid exercises that may cause you problems and will adjust to your mobility limitations.

preferences.title: Preferences and Duration
preferences.subtitle: Customize your program and define how long it will last.
preferences.deloadIncluded: Will include deload weeks for recovery

variety.lowDesc: Same basic exercises each week, easy to follow
variety.mediumDesc: Moderate variety, balance between consistency and novelty

generation.timeWarning: This may take up to 2 minutes. We are analyzing your goals and creating an optimized program for you.
generation.savingDescription: We are saving your program to the database. You will be redirected to the editor shortly.

quickConfig.title: Quick Configuration
quickConfig.subtitle: {{name}}'s data is already loaded. Just configure the program duration.
quickConfig.mesocycleInfo: This will create {{blocks}} block(s) of {{weeks}} weeks
